name: forking
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
fork
fork verb
(DIVIDE)
[ I ] If a road or river forks, it divides into two parts: The hotel is near where the road forks.
[ I + adv/prep ] UK to turn in one of two different directions: Fork left/right where the road divides.

fork verb
(GARDEN)
[ T ] to move or dig something with a fork
